languages.text: Три клана, стоящие у истоков волнений в Четвертом Складочном, ждут ответа на их требования. Ждет приказа и присланный сенешалем спецотряд.
The three clans that instigated the unrest in Depot 4 are awaiting a response to their demands. The assault unit dispatched by the Seneschal is also awaiting orders.
languages.original_text: Три клана, стоящие у истоков волнений в Четвертом Складочном, ждут ответа на их требования. Ждет приказа и присланный сенешалем спецотряд.

traits.locale_text: The three clans that instigated the unrest in Depot 4 are awaiting a response to their demands. The assault unit dispatched by the seneschal is also awaiting orders.
The three clans that instigated the unrest in Depot 4 are awaiting a response to their demands. The assault unit dispatched by the seneschal is also awaiting orders.
The three clans that instigated the unrest in Depot 4 are awaiting a response to their demands. The assault unit dispatched by the seneschal is also awaiting orders.
The three clans that instigated the unrest in Depot 4 are awaiting a response to their demands. The assault unit dispatched by the Seneschal is also awaiting orders.

languages.text: 在四号货栈挑起动乱的三个氏族正在等待行商浪人回应他们的要求，总领派出的突击队也在等候命令。
languages.original_text: The three clans that instigated the unrest in Depot 4 are awaiting a response to their demands. The assault unit dispatched by the Seneschal is also awaiting orders.

traits.locale_text: 在四号货栈挑起动乱的三个氏族正在等待行商浪人回应他们的要求，总领派出的突击队也在等候命令。

languages.text: 第四倉庫で暴動を引き起こした3つの氏族は、要求に対する回答を待っている。家令長が派遣したアサルト部隊もまた命令を待っていた。
languages.original_text: The three clans that instigated the unrest in Depot 4 are awaiting a response to their demands. The assault unit dispatched by the Seneschal is also awaiting orders.

traits.locale_text: 第四倉庫で暴動を引き起こした3つの氏族は、要求に対する回答を待っている。家令長が派遣したアサルト部隊もまた命令を待っていた。

languages.text: Los tres clanes que han instigado los disturbios del Depósito 4 esperan una respuesta a sus exigencias. Por su parte, la unidad de asalto enviada por el Senescal espera órdenes.
languages.original_text: The three clans that instigated the unrest in Depot 4 are awaiting a response to their demands. The assault unit dispatched by the Seneschal is also awaiting orders.

traits.locale_text: Los tres clanes que han instigado los disturbios del Depósito 4 esperan una respuesta a sus exigencias. Por su parte, la unidad de asalto enviada por el Senescal espera órdenes.

languages.text: Die drei Clans, die den Aufstand in Depot 4 angezettelt haben, erwarten eine Reaktion auf ihre Forderungen. Die vom Truchsess entsandte Sturmeinheit erwartet ebenfalls weitere Befehle.
languages.original_text: The three clans that instigated the unrest in Depot 4 are awaiting a response to their demands. The assault unit dispatched by the Seneschal is also awaiting orders.

traits.locale_text: Die drei Clans, die den Aufstand in Depot 4 angezettelt haben, erwarten eine Reaktion auf ihre Forderungen. Die vom Truchsess entsandte Sturmeinheit erwartet ebenfalls weitere Befehle.

languages.text: Les trois clans à l'origine des troubles dans le dépôt 4 attendent qu'on réponde à leurs exigences. L'unité d'assaut dépêchée par le sénéchal attend également ses ordres.
languages.original_text: The three clans that instigated the unrest in Depot 4 are awaiting a response to their demands. The assault unit dispatched by the Seneschal is also awaiting orders.

traits.locale_text: Les trois clans à l'origine des troubles dans le dépôt 4 attendent qu'on réponde à leurs exigences. L'unité d'assaut dépêchée par le sénéchal attend également ses ordres.

languages.text: 4. Depo'daki ayaklanmayı kışkırtan üç klan, taleplerine cevap bekliyor. Seneşal'in görevlendirdiği taarruz birimi de emir bekliyor.
languages.original_text: The three clans that instigated the unrest in Depot 4 are awaiting a response to their demands. The assault unit dispatched by the Seneschal is also awaiting orders.
